gameDetails.name: Too Many Bones: Dart
gameDetails.description:
A former lab employee who saw any number of atrocities, Dart escaped Nobolous' employment with the help of the pigadillo she befriended in the baddie pens.

With a penchant for pharmaceutical concoctions and an unstable side (literally), this new Gearloc add-on for Too Many Bones and Undertow is one of our most unique gearlocs to date.

With dice that work differently from front side to back side, Dart has solid crowd control as well as a mean streak if you are able to time things correctly. Bottom line, Dart brings a host of unique gameplay options to the TMB series.

—description from the publisher
